abstract: Mansour J Arbabsiar, Iranian-American man charged in a plot to kill the Saudi ambassador to the United States, pleads not guilty in Manhattan; Arbabsiar is accused of conspiring to hire assassins from a Mexican drug cartel to kill Abdel al-Jubeir.
snippet: Prosecutors have said that Mansour J. Arbabsiar, an American citizen, was part of an Iranian-directed plot to hire Mexican criminals to kill the Saudi ambassador.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors have said that Mansour J. Arbabsiar, an American citizen, was part of an Iranian-directed plot to hire Mexican criminals to kill the Saudi ambassador.

headline.main: Not-Guilty Plea in Plot to Kill Saudi Ambassador to the U.S.
headline.print_headline: Not-Guilty Plea in Plot to Kill Saudi Ambassador to the U.S.
headline.seo: In Plot to Kill Saudi Ambassador to U.S., Suspect Pleads Not Guilty
